name: Give me a second
description:
Give me a second-a platformer where you have to play one of 4 unique characters who need to overcome the challenges and get the world Cup! Each world has its own traps about features! To complete the level, you are given a few seconds, which you can get by collecting fruits. This is a real challenge even for the most experienced players.

Features:

  • In each level, there are several ways to pass;
  • Dynamic gameplay;
  • Beautiful graphics;
  • Challenges;
  • 3 unique worlds.

And most importantly, don't trust anyone...
